## Restaurants

**Near Wyndham**:

Butterjoint (modern American), [link](https://butterjoint.com/)

The Cafe Carnegie (only during lunch hours, inside the Carnegie Museum), [location](https://goo.gl/maps/hxaioEVPtCHU1XWk8), [link](https://thecafecarnegie.com/menu.html)

Spirits and Tales (modern American, inside The Oaklander hotel, top floor), [location](https://goo.gl/maps/yXbj1SxXrLNamyat7), [link](https://www.spiritsandtales.com/)

**Short car/bus ride**

Apteka (central and eastern European vegan), [location](https://goo.gl/maps/egw4kbN8283x4vTa7), [link](https://aptekapgh.com/)

Casbah (mediterranean), [location](https://goo.gl/maps/ktao7oJvzWmeKgqs6), [link](https://www.casbah.kitchen/)

DiAnoia (Italian), [location](https://g.page/DiAnoiasEatery?share), [link](https://www.dianoiaseatery.com/menu/)

Everyday Noodle (Chinese), [location](https://g.page/EverydayNoodles?share), [link](http://everydaynoodles.net/)

Morcilla (gourmet tapas), [location](https://goo.gl/maps/KGNRR4BkrseK7YZXA), [link](https://www.morcillapittsburgh.com/menus)

Umami (Japanese), [location](https://g.page/UmamiPgh?share), [link](https://umamipgh.com/)

## Culture and kids

Arsenal Bowl (old school bowling), [location](https://g.page/ArsenalBowl?share), [link](http://arsenalbowl.com/)

Carnegie Museum of Art, [location](https://goo.gl/maps/7QwuZSa5TA9D6a2TA) [link](https://cmoa.org/)

Carnegie Museum of Natural History, [location](https://goo.gl/maps/a7vBBAvHAdqykxdC7), [link](https://carnegiemnh.org/)

Children's Museum of Pittsburgh, [location](https://g.page/pittsburghkids?share), [link](https://www.pittsburghkids.org/)

Phipps Conservatory and Botanical Garden, [location](https://goo.gl/maps/zNcF3Tw2zEfLj6QG8), [link](https://phipps.conservatory.org/visit-and-explore/visit/cafe-phipps/)

Pittsburgh Zoo, [location](https://g.page/pghzoo?share), [link](https://www.pittsburghzoo.org/)

Warhol Museum, [location](https://g.page/thewarholmuseum?share), [link](https://www.warhol.org/)

Walk through one of the many parks of the city: Schenley (closest to the conference), Frick, Highland Park, or Allegheny Cemetery
